All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnalysisUtility
Utility class providing common analytical operations for Document objects.
App
The entry class for your solution.
CountryAnalyser
Analyzes a document of CountryEntry objects to extract the country with the highest population density.
CountryCsvParser
A CSV parser specialized for parsing country data entries.
CountryEntry
Represents a data entry for a specific country.
CsvParser
An abstract parser class for CSV documents that implements IDocumentParser.
Document
Represents an abstract document containing a list of DocumentEntry.
DocumentCreationException
Custom exception that should be thrown if Document creation fails.
DocumentEntry
Represents an abstract entry within a Document.
IDocumentAnalyser
Defines a contract for analyzing a Document containing DocumentEntry objects to determine the best matching entry based on a specific criterion.
IDocumentParser
Interface for parsing a document from a given file path.
IEntryWithComparableNumericTuple
Functional interface providing a contract for an entry that can produce a numeric score for comparison purposes.
NumericComparisonType
Enumeration defining strategies for comparing numeric values when determining the "best" score in analytical operations.
ParameterValidationUtility
Utility class providing methods to check method parameters for validity.
StringParsingUtility
Utility class providing methods for parsing Strings.
WeatherAnalyser
Analyzes a weather document to find the entry with the smallest temperature spread.
WeatherCsvParser
A CSV parser specifically for weather data entries.
WeatherEntry
Represents a weather data entry for a specific day, containing the maximum and minimum temperatures.
